td.content: s:pt complains of moderate heartburn, moderate epigastric pain and Stomach. NKDA. she is a female retired aged 74 Ys. she does not smoke she drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 70 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:patient c/o 4 days h/o moderate heartburn (not checked), moderate epigastric pain. NKDA. she is a white female aged 74 Ys. o:Height 69 in, Weight 138 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily.

s:a female retired aged 75 years c/o 2 weeks h/o mild flatulence. NKDA. she reports having no more than one drink a day Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 70 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
